context: American Idol premiered in <a4_0>June <a0_0>2002<a4_0/><a0_0/> and became the surprise <a3_0>summer<a3_0/> hit show of 2002. The first show drew <a1_0><a5_0>9.9 million<a5_0/><a1_0/> viewers, giving Fox the best viewing figure for the 8.30 pm spot in over a year. The audience steadily grew, and by finale night, the audience had averaged <a2_0><a6_0>23 million<a6_0/><a2_0/>, with more than 40 million watching some part of that show.
